articles.author: Lucia Stein, Lucy Sweeney
articles.title: Donald Trump is running in 2024. These were the key moments from his speech promising to bring about 'America's comeback' - ABC News
articles.description: In officially announcing he's running for president again in 2024, Donald Trump puts his own spin on the midterm elections, hints at the 'Big Lie', and avoids digs at his biggest Republican rivals.
articles.content:
After teasing a "big announcement" that sparked a flurry of speculation last week, Donald Trump has declared his intention to run for president in 2024.
The business mogul today announced his third … [+8681 chars]
